title: Manual testing checklist export — Step 6 item 8
setup: Audit finds and fixes issues. Agent has completed Step 6 items 1–7 (summary, passed criteria, out of scope, reports) and is now at item 8.
expected_behavior: Outputs the mandatory manual testing reminder message verbatim before offering the checklist
Asks whether to export the checklist as a Yes/No question — does NOT skip this question
If user answers Yes and a save path was already set in Step 6 item 6: reuses that path without asking again
If user answers Yes and no path was set yet: asks where to save using the standard save location question
If user answers Yes: runs `node scripts/report-checklist.mjs --output <path>/checklist.html --base-url <URL>`
Verifies the file exists on disk before confirming generation
If user answers No: proceeds to Step 6 item 9 (closing message) without generating the file
Does NOT generate the checklist without explicit user approval
